name: In the Matter of the ESTATE OF Laird M. WOLFE, Deceased. Appeal of Linda D. Wolfe
name_abbreviation: In re the Estate of Wolfe

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., and SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY and GREENSPAN, JJ.
parties: In the Matter of the ESTATE OF Laird M. WOLFE, Deceased. Appeal of Linda D. Wolfe.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been IMPROVIDENTLY GRANTED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: David Matthew Gulnac, Esq., for Linda D. Wolfe.
Louis C. Alvin, Esq., Pittsburgh, for Eva J. Allen.
